verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which came unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when king <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto him Pashhur <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah <S%H4441><s%>, and Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, the priest <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Inquire <S%H1875><s%>, I pray thee <S%H3068><s%>, of Jehovah for us <S%H1157><s%>; for Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> maketh war <S%H3898><s%> against us <S%H3068><s%>: peradventure Jehovah will deal <S%H6213><s%> with us according to all his wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>, that he may go up from us <S%H5927><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus shall ye say to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Behold <S%H5437><s%>, I will turn back the weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that are in your hands <S%H3027><s%>, wherewith ye fight <S%H3898><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and against the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> that besiege <S%H6696><s%> you <S%H2351><s%>, without the walls <S%H2346><s%>; and I will gather <S%H622><s%> them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of this city <S%H5892><s%>.

And I myself will fight <S%H3898><s%> against you with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, even in anger <S%H639><s%>, and in wrath <S%H2534><s%>, and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation <S%H7110><s%>.

And I will smite <S%H5221><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this city <S%H5892><s%>, both man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>: they shall die <S%H4191><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%>, even such as are left <S%H7604><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%> from the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, from the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and from the famine <S%H7458><s%>, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that seek <S%H1245><s%> their life <S%H5315><s%>: and he shall smite <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; he shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> them <S%H2550><s%>, neither have pity, nor have mercy <S%H7355><s%>.

And unto this people <S%H5971><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I set before <S%H6440><s%> you the way <S%H1870><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> and the way <S%H1870><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.

He that abideth <S%H3427><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>; but he that goeth out <S%H3318><s%>, and passeth <S%H5307><s%> over to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> that besiege <S%H6696><s%> you <S%H2421><s%>, he shall live, and his life <S%H5315><s%> shall be unto him for a prey <S%H7998><s%>.

For I have set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> upon this city <S%H5892><s%> for evil <S%H7451><s%>, and not for good <S%H2896><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it shall be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>.
And touching the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

O house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Execute <S%H1777><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> him that is robbed <S%H1497><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the oppressor <S%H6231><s%>, lest my wrath <S%H2534><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%>, and burn <S%H1197><s%> so that none can quench <S%H3518><s%> it <S%H6440><s%>, because of the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%>.

Behold <S%H3427><s%>, I am against thee, O inhabitant of the valley <S%H6010><s%>, and of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; you that say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall come down <S%H5181><s%> against us <S%H935><s%>? or who shall enter into our habitations <S%H4585><s%>?

And I will punish <S%H6485><s%> you according to the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in her forest <S%H3293><s%>, and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> all that is round about her <S%H5439><s%>.
